nodes.label: Detect & Classify Alert
nodes.question: What type of security event/alert is this?

nodes.label: Assess Severity (CVSS/Impact)
nodes.question: What is the severity level — Critical, High, Medium, or Low?

nodes.label: Identify Indicators of Compromise
nodes.question: Are there known IOCs (IPs, hashes, domains, TTPs)?

nodes.label: Map to MITRE ATT&CK
nodes.question: Which tactics and techniques (TXXXX) does this map to?

nodes.label: Determine Scope & Impact
nodes.question: How many systems/users are affected? Is data at risk?

nodes.label: Initiate Containment
nodes.question: Isolate affected systems, block malicious IPs/domains, disable compromised accounts.

nodes.label: Preserve Evidence
nodes.question: Collect logs, memory dumps, network captures for forensics.

nodes.label: Remediate & Recover
nodes.question: Patch vulnerabilities, restore from backups, reset credentials.

nodes.label: Post-Incident Review
nodes.question: Document timeline, root cause, and improvements.

nodes.label: Escalate to IR Team ⚠️
nodes.question: Critical severity or APT indicators — escalate immediately.

nodes.label: Mark as False Positive
nodes.question: Confirmed benign — tune detection rules to reduce noise.
